reviewText: Being a Deadliest Catch fanatic, I love everything to do with Deadliest Catch! This is by far one of the best things I have bought!
Title: Deadliest Catch: Season 2

reviewText: Different though. There's less talk by Mike Rowe, but his voice is just perfect for this kind of thing. The end of the season episode, with the meeting with family members, is just the perfect end to a glorious show. I can feel completely identified with the human species watching it: priceless.It gives less importance to the competitive side this time. There are no provisional "scores" but that doesn't play as a minus. Maybe there are not so many flashbacks either. There are moments without commentary, where one finds himself "embedded" on the seas watching just like one more man in the crew, silently living it from the couch.Even if you don't care about the sea, watch it for its human worth. It's like an oasis away from politics and trivial city stuff.
summary: As good as the first season
Title: Deadliest Catch: Season 2

reviewText: I was eagerly anticipating Season 2 of "Deadliest Catch" for more than one reason:  firstly, I feel as if I really know all these guys and wanted to see what new adventures they were having and, secondly, I use the show as an example of "alternative careers" for my students where I teach business courses at an inner-city high school in Rhode Island.  It is a true eye-opener for them as well as being entertaining!  (Ironically, last spring, after showing a few of Season 1's episodes, one of my students lost her dad who was swept overboard while lobster fishing off the RI coast - his body was never found.  It certainly reinforced how true "Deadliest Catch" really is.)I highly recommend the DVD for those who want to expand their knowledge and experiences while being entertained.  I plan on buying "Ice Truckers" next, having heard it is just as fascinating.
Title: Deadliest Catch: Season 2

reviewText: I love watching, "Deadliest Catch". I watch it at night on my laptop and it makes me feel warm and cozy! Great filming and love those seamen!
Title: Deadliest Catch: Season 2

reviewText: I bought this for my sons-in-law who live in Australia.  They watch the show when visiting us.  We sent them the DVD's so they can watch the old shows and look forward to the new episodes when they come for another visit.
Title: Deadliest Catch: Season 2

reviewText: I love this show and was so happy be able to watch this show anytime. The reality of this job is crazy, and the people that do the jobs must be crazy to do it, I say that in the best possible way. Watching this show is some what humbling, and I would tell anyone that wants to watch a show that is real to the core then get this show !
Title: Deadliest Catch: Season 2

reviewText: Because its awesome! Because Sig and the boys rock that crab and keep me coming back for more each week.
Title: Deadliest Catch: Season 2

reviewText: I'VE ENJOYED THIS SHOW SINCE THE FIRST TIME I WATCHED, SO I WANTED TO OWN IT. THIS WAY I CAN WATCH THESE GUYS ANYTIME I 'D LIKE, OUT THERE DOING THE JOB MOST PEOPLE WOULDN'T WANT TO DO. I LOVE THIS SHOW, AND THIS IS A EXCELLENT COLLECTION TO HAVE!!!
summary: ONE OF THE BEST SHOWS GOING
Title: Deadliest Catch: Season 2

reviewText: I really enjoy watching these episodes again and again.  Deadliest Catch is a great show!
Title: Deadliest Catch: Season 2
